faqs.title: FAQs
faqs.subtitle: Find answers to your most common questions about our sunglasses and services.

q1.question: What is UV protection?
q1.answer: UV protection is essential for safeguarding your eyes from harmful rays. Our sunglasses provide 100% UV protection, ensuring your eyes stay safe while looking stylish. Enjoy the sun without worry!

q2.question: How is shipping handled?
q2.answer: We offer fast and reliable shipping options for all orders. Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days. You will receive a tracking number once your order is shipped.

q3.question: What is your return policy?
q3.answer: We accept returns within 30 days of purchase. Items must be unworn and in their original packaging. Please contact our support team for return instructions.

q4.question: How to care for sunglasses?
q4.answer: To maintain your sunglasses, clean the lenses with a microfiber cloth. Avoid using harsh chemicals or abrasive materials. Store them in a protective case when not in use.

q5.question: Do you offer warranties?
q5.answer: Yes, we provide a one-year warranty against manufacturing defects. This warranty covers repairs or replacements for any issues that arise during normal use. Please keep your receipt for warranty claims.

returnsPolicy.title: Returns Policy
returnsPolicy.intro: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. Please review our returns policy below.

sections.heading: Eligibility
sections.content: Products must be returned within 14 days of delivery in original condition.

sections.heading: Return Process
sections.content: To initiate a return, contact our support team via email or phone.

sections.heading: Refunds
sections.content: Refunds will be processed to your original payment method within 5 business days after we receive the returned product.

sections.heading: Exclusions
sections.content: Certain items, like personalized products, are not eligible for returns.

shippingInfo.title: Shipping Information
shippingInfo.intro: We are committed to delivering your order safely and on time. Please read our shipping details below.

sections.heading: Processing Time
sections.content: Orders are processed within 1-2 business days before shipment.

sections.heading: Shipping Methods
sections.content: We use standard and express shipping options. Costs vary depending on location and weight.

sections.heading: Delivery Time
sections.content: Standard shipping takes 1-2 business days. Express shipping takes 1 business days.

sections.heading: International Shipping
sections.content: We ship worldwide. Customs fees may apply depending on the destination country.
